projectGridLines.title: Title: AI/ML Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Title: AI/ML Intern

 

Description:

As an AI/ML Intern at Digitral Pvt Ltd, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and explore emerging technologies in artificial intelligence. Your role will involve two primary focus areas:

Independent POC Development:

·        Work on individual Proof-of-Concept (POC) projects designed to explore and demonstrate innovative AI technologies.

·        Conduct research, experimentation, and prototype-building using AI tools and frameworks.

·        Develop solutions in areas such as machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision to address real-world problems and shape future products.

Feature Development on Existing Products:

·        Collaborate with the development team to enhance existing products by integrating new features, including AI-powered functionalities.

·        Understand the product roadmap and learn best practices in AI and software development.

·        Contribute meaningful improvements to enhance product usability, performance, and customer satisfaction.

 

Skill sets:

Basic understanding of AI and machine learning concepts

Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or JavaScript

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic, fast-paced environment

 

Traits expectation:

·        Curiosity and eagerness to explore and learn new technologies.

·        Strong communication skills to share insights and collaborate effectively.

·        A proactive approach with attention to detail.

 

Expected learning:

·        Mentorship: Receive guidance from experienced team members to enhance your technical and professional skills.

·        Real-World Projects: Work on live projects that provide hands-on experience and exposure to real-world challenges.

 

Specific courses required for project execution:

While not mandatory, candidates with coursework or certifications in the following areas will be at an advantage:

  • Machine Learning or Deep Learning
  • Natural Language Processing
  • Computer Vision
  • Data Science and Analytics
  • Python or AI Frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)

 

This role offers a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in the evolving field of AI and make a tangible impact by contributing to real-world applications.
